tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Makhija is one of the best doctors I have been to. It was our first time visiting him . He carefully heard the issues, explained the probable causes and treatment and also answered all our queries very patiently.  Not once did he make us feel hurried, which is very rare among the doctors today.  His diagnosis and treatment seems to be working well.
I wholeheartedly recommend Dr Makhija.
Thank you doctor!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: My father in law had severe pain in his shoulders. Couldn‚Äôt lift his hand. Visited Dr.Kunal Makhija. He looked into the problem and prescribed medicine. There were signs of improvement from the very next day. By the 3rd day no pain able to make movement. Thanks Doctor!

tags: None
review: My Mother in law had hip fracture and we were so tensed wether she will walk again. Dr Kunal Makhija performed Hip replacement on her and she started walking on second day of surgery, we were confused whether to shift her to Mumbai Hospital but we dint, I am very happy with Dr Makhija approach and way He cheers up the patient and leaves a lifelong impression.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My brother got his ACL & PCL reconstruction surgery done by Doctor Makhija. The doctor made us feel very comfortable as he explained the problem in detail. He was very patient with us to answer all our queries. After giving a lot of time and confidence to my brother, the complicated ACL/PCL  reconstruction surgery was carried out successfully. He gave us logical answers, minimal medicines, correct guidance, motivation & support at the time of recovery. Never did we feel or doubt any decision taken by him for my brother‚Äôs knee condition. My brother is recovering at a great speed, continuing his physiotherapy. And even now, the doctor is keeping a check on him and his progress. We‚Äôre are just really happy & lucky to have found the right doctor for this surgery. ** ****** **** ** ** ********* ********** ** *** ***  *** ** ****** ** *** *******Thank you.
reply_text:
Thanks a lot Ap**** for trusting me ..
I am sure He will do well . He is a very good pateint...

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: My dad was suffering thorough his pain of spinal cord due to some issue in disc lumber.. we had gone to one doctor but his consultation was not satisfactory and was so different.. then our family doctor gave me a reference of Dr. Kunal Makhija and then we went to him. And after discussing with Dr. Kunal we underatood what exactly happened, he explained us amazingly.. And at that same moment we decided to do the operation immediately.. And in next day Dr. Kunal has done my dad's operation very well.. And now my dad's pain of spinal disc has gone away.. Thank you Dr. Kunal Makhija..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Kunal Makhija is a very professional orthopedic surgeon. *** ********* ** ******* *** *********** Most important his friendly behavior and encouragement gives 50% relax to patient before treatment or surgery. I came here for my right hand index finger fractured and dislocated  treatment. it was critical condition as I came to him after 15 days of fracture. And he did surgery and my finger is alright now after 3 week. He always takes care of his patients very closely. I must refer & recommend him for other patients.
